00034                 // viewport parameters specified in the draw context.
00035                 OMEGA_API static void beginOverlayMode(const omega::DrawContext& context);
00036

00038                 OMEGA_API static void endOverlayMode();

00041                 OMEGA_API static void drawText(int x, int y, const char* s, Font f = Helvetica12);

00044                 OMEGA_API static void drawWireTeapot(float size);
